welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yuanlin, Taiwan! This charming city is known for its rich cultural heritage, delicious street food, and beautiful temples. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yuanlin has to offer!

restaurants.name: 右舍咖啡
restaurants.description: 右舍咖啡 is a café located in 員林市.
restaurants.address: 萬年路三段67號, 員林市,  510

restaurants.name: 米其軒
